results.title: Jurnee Smollett: ‘The Past Few Years Have Been Heartbreaking’
results.abstract: The “Lovecraft Country” star has faced setbacks but emerged with new projects, including the Netflix movie “Spiderhead.”

multimedia.caption: Jurnee Smollett’s career has included film (“Birds of Prey,” “Eve’s Bayou”), TV (“Lovecraft Country,” “Friday Night Lights”) and theater (“The Trip to Bountiful”). “I’m trying to find a balance between enjoying the now, because that’s something I struggle with, and always looking to the future,” she said.
multimedia.copyright: Akilah Townsend for The New York Times

results.title: Ray Liotta, of ‘Goodfellas’ and ‘Field of Dreams,’ Dies at 67

results.title: In ‘The Royal,’ a Life Is Rebuilt in Spite of Everything
results.abstract: A film tells the true story of Willie Aikens, a World Series star for the Kansas City Royals whose life was derailed by drugs — and prison — before he pieced it back together.

multimedia.caption: In 1980, Willie Aikens of the Kansas City Royals did something no one had done before him: Had two multihomer games in one World Series. His career soon unraveled because of drugs.
In 1980, Willie Aikens of the Kansas City Royals did something no one had done before him: Had two multihomer games in one World Series. His career soon unraveled because of drugs.

results.title: Kevin Spacey to Voluntarily Travel to Britain to Face Sexual Assault Charges
results.abstract: The actor said in a statement to “Good Morning America” that he will seek to prove his innocence against the charges.

multimedia.caption: “I will voluntarily appear in the U.K. as soon as can be arranged and defend myself against these charges, which I am confident will prove my innocence,” the actor Kevin Spacey said in a statement on Tuesday.

“I will voluntarily appear in the U.K. as soon as can be arranged and defend myself against these charges, which I am confident will prove my innocence,” the actor Kevin Spacey said in a statement on Tuesday.

results.title: Heddy Honigmann, Whose Films Told of Loss and Love, Dies at 70
results.abstract: A documentarian, she liked to engage her subjects — Parisian subway buskers, Peruvian taxi drivers, survivors of genocide — in conversations.

multimedia.caption: The filmmaker Heddy Honigmann in an undated photo. “In this country, among documentary filmmakers, Heddy was a star,” one observer said. “In Europe, she was a superstar. In the Netherlands, she’s a national treasure.”

The filmmaker Heddy Honigmann in an undated photo. “In this country, among documentary filmmakers, Heddy was a star,” one observer said. “In Europe, she was a superstar. In the Netherlands, she’s a national treasure.”
